me.shivzee.util

Class Utility

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.shivzee.util.Utility

  • public class Utility
extends Object
    The Utility class provides various helper methods for common operations.

    This class includes methods for generating random strings, parsing dates, and safely evaluating expressions that might throw NullPointerException.

    • Method Detail

      • createRandomString

        public static String createRandomString(int length)
        Generates a random string of specified length using alphanumeric characters.
        Parameters:
        length - the desired length of the random string
        Returns:
        a randomly generated string containing only lowercase letters and numbers

      • parseToDefaultTimeZone

        public static ZonedDateTime parseToDefaultTimeZone(String dateTime,
                                                   String pattern)
                                            throws DateTimeParserException
        Parses a date string to a ZonedDateTime object using the specified pattern.

        The resulting ZonedDateTime will be in the system's default time zone.

        Parameters:
        dateTime - the date string to parse
        pattern - the pattern to use for parsing the date
        Returns:
        a ZonedDateTime object representing the parsed date
        Throws:
        DateTimeParserException - if the date string cannot be parsed using the given pattern

      • safeEval

        public static <T> T safeEval(Supplier<T> supplier)
        Safely evaluates a supplier that might throw a NullPointerException.

        If the supplier throws a NullPointerException, this method returns null instead of propagating the exception.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the value returned by the supplier
        Parameters:
        supplier - the supplier to evaluate
        Returns:
        the result of the supplier, or null if a NullPointerException occurs
